extendedInfo.description: The simple, precise and frighteningly accurate quiz that tells the truth about your relationship!Find out if your partner is the right one for you, if what you have is forever or only a passing fad. After you take it yourself, you should pass it around to your friends. See what this psychological wonder has to say about their relationships as well!It's quick and it's free and it will definitely impress you.Over 50000 people have it on their iPhones - now you can have it too on your Android device.

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Sucks ads direct you to the web every 3 seconds
reviews.author: A Google User
